verses.text: The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w reigneth|strong="H4427"\w*; let the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H1523"\w*; let the \w multitude|strong="H7227"\w* of \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \add thereof\add*.\f + \fr 97.1 \ft multitude…: Heb. many, or, great isles\f*

\w Clouds|strong="H6051"\w* and \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w* \add are\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* him: \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w* and \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add are\add* the \w habitation|strong="H4349"\w* of his \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*.\f + \fr 97.2 \ft habitation: or, establishment\f*
A \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* \w goeth|strong="H3212"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him, and burneth \w up|strong="H3857"\w* his \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.
His \w lightnings|strong="H1300"\w* \w enlightened|strong="H0215"\w* the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*: the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w trembled|strong="H2342"\w*.

The \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* \w melted|strong="H4549"\w* like \w wax|strong="H1749"\w* at the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, at the \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w Lord|strong="H0113"\w* of the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.
The \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* \w declare|strong="H5046"\w* his \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*.

\w Confounded|strong="H0954"\w* be all they that \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* graven \w images|strong="H6459"\w*, that \w boast|strong="H1984"\w* themselves of \w idols|strong="H0457"\w*: \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* him, all \add ye\add* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w*, and was \w glad|strong="H8055"\w*; and the \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w rejoiced|strong="H1523"\w* because of thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

For thou, \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add art\add* high \w above|strong="H5945"\w* all the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: thou art \w exalted|strong="H5927"\w* far \w above|strong="H3966"\w* all \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*.

Ye that \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*: he \w preserveth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* of his \w saints|strong="H2623"\w*; he \w delivereth|strong="H5337"\w* them out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*.
\w Light|strong="H0216"\w* is \w sown|strong="H2232"\w* for the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, and \w gladness|strong="H8057"\w* for the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.

\w Rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, ye \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*; and give \w thanks|strong="H3034"\w* at the \w remembrance|strong="H2143"\w* of his \w holiness|strong="H6944"\w*.\f + \fr 97.12 \ft at…: or, to the memorial\f*
